title: How Steve Nash and the Phoenix Suns Changed Basketball
description:
Shukri reviews the book: Seven Seconds or Less: My Season on the Bench with the Runnin' and Gunnin' Phoenix Suns by Jack McCallum. This book is an insider's view of a team that changed professional basketball. You will hear about people like Steve Nash, Mike D'Antoni, and Amar'e Stoudemire on this podcast. Plus, you will get Shukri's memories of this fun, energetic Phoenix Suns team. 

Thanks for listening to The Class X Podcast.

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/classxpodcast/message
